wikipedia_page.main: Edward Perkins Alexander (7 August 1863 – 26 October 1931) was a Welsh international rugby union forward who played club rugby for Cambridge University and London Welsh and international rugby for Wales. Alexander also represented several cricket teams, including Llandovery College.

response: * Edward Perkins Alexander (1863–1931), Welsh rugby union player
